detectors.description:

detectors.description: TxOrigin.bug0() (tests/mini_dataset/tx_origin.sol#14-16) uses tx.origin for authorization: require(bool)(tx.origin == owner) (tests/mini_dataset/tx_origin.sol#15)
TxOrigin.bug2() (tests/mini_dataset/tx_origin.sol#18-22) uses tx.origin for authorization: tx.origin == owner (tests/mini_dataset/tx_origin.sol#19)

TxOrigin.bug5() (tests/mini_dataset/tx_origin.sol#34-39) uses tx.origin for authorization: tx.origin != owner (tests/mini_dataset/tx_origin.sol#35)
solc-0.4.24 is not recommended for deployment
